## Regular:

The Arithmetic mean is equal to $latex \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=i}^{n} x_{i}$, or the summation of n numbers divided by n.

The Arithmetic mean is equal to $\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=i}^{n} x_{i}$, or the summation of n numbers divided by n.

The Arithmetic mean is equal to \( \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=i}^{n} x_{i} \), or the summation of n numbers divided by n.


The Arithmetic mean is equal to $$latex \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=i}^{n} x_{i}$$, or the summation of n numbers divided by n.

The Arithmetic mean is equal to $$\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=i}^{n} x_{i}$$, or the summation of n numbers divided by n.

The Arithmetic mean is equal to \[ \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=i}^{n} x_{i} \], or the summation of n numbers divided by n.
